content.question: Students testing two different toy cars on a straight track determine that, starting from rest, Car <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> reaches a velocity <math alttext="v sub uppercase A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> in a displacement of <math alttext="x sub uppercase A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>x</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> and Car <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> reaches a velocity of <math alttext="2 v sub uppercase A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> in a displacement of <math alttext="2 x sub uppercase A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>x</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>. The motion of each car can be modeled with constant acceleration. If the acceleration of Car <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> is <math alttext="lowercase a sub uppercase A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>, what is the acceleration of Car <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction lowercase a sub uppercase A, over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msub><mi>a</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="lowercase a sub uppercase A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="2 lowercase a sub uppercase A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>a</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="4 lowercase a sub uppercase A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>a</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 lowercase a sub uppercase A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>a</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>
